experience.title: GTM Intern
experience.description: • Designed an optimized account coverage model across pan India market through data analysis & mining• Formulated an account profiling & resource deployment strategy for print enterprise business• Interacted with the area & zonal managers to resolve real-time challenges in account management• Identified pain points causing low mind share through market research with channel partners• Conducted competitor analysis & recommended areas of improvements for better partner engagement

experience.title: Monitoring And Evaluation Project Manager
experience.description: • As a member of the Sakhi Suraksha, the flagship project of Oorjaa - MnE team, worked for the upliftment of more than 300 women and adolescent girls. • Designed the project plan to set clear project goals and deliverables. During the tenure, identified and solved operational issues of the project.• Involved in the recruitment and mentoring of volunteers and led a team of 8 volunteers to implement the initiative effectively.

experience.title: Performance Engineer
experience.description: • Delivered performance analysis, recommendations & root cause analysis for STM Application across platforms to ensure stability and scalability leading to increased customer acquisition• Revamped performance testing methods of UI, Database & API through automation that reduced test cycle duration  & improved throughput & response times for customers• Benchmarked the application to limit the deviation within 5% through test script execution & performance counter monitoring thereby enhancing the application’s value proposition• Mentored a team of new joiners with knowledge transfer & conducted brainstorming sessions
experience.description_html: • Delivered performance analysis, recommendations & root cause analysis for STM Application across platforms to ensure stability and scalability leading to increased customer acquisition• Revamped performance testing methods of UI, Database & API through automation that reduced test cycle duration & improved throughput & response times for customers• Benchmarked the application to limit the deviation within 5% through test script execution & performance counter monitoring thereby enhancing the application’s value proposition• Mentored a team of new joiners with knowledge transfer & conducted brainstorming sessions

experience.title: DevOps Intern
experience.description: • Automated the CI/CD process & diminished build time significantly to ensure faster delivery. • Developed application deployment solutions & improved team collaborations using version control.• Experience in working with Build Tool Maven and continuous integration tool such as Jenkins.• Experience working in Team Foundation Server (TFS) and Visual Studio Team Services (VSTS).• Experience in working on various operating systems like Linux, Windows. • Experience in Packaging tools like Flexera InstallShield and WIX.
